PackageOracle.name: DA_CONTENT_PROVIDER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CONTENT_PROVIDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.868136000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_party_id IN NUMBER
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_content_provider;

body.name: DA_CONTENT_PROVIDER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CONTENT_PROVIDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.879674000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_provider.add(fx), parms=' || content_provider_nm || '|' || content_provider_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_provider a
(
a.content_provider_party_id
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.content_provider_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_content_provider_party_id.NEXTVAL
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.content_provider_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.content_provider_party_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_provider.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_provider.add, parms=' || content_provider_nm || '|' || content_provider_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_provider a
(
a.content_provider_party_id
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.content_provider_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_content_provider_party_id.NEXTVAL
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.content_provider_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_provider.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_party_id IN NUMBER
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_provider.add, parms=' || content_provider_party_id || '|' || content_provider_nm || '|' || content_provider_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_provider a
(
a.content_provider_party_id
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.content_provider_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.content_provider_party_id
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.content_provider_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_provider.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_provider_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_provider.del, parms=' || content_provider_party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_content_provider a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.content_provider_party_id = del.content_provider_party_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_provider.del');

END del;

END da_content_provider;
